str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Feminine Singular

str2: A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
(Hebrew), Lot, nephew of Abraham. Of Hebrew origin; Lot, a patriarch.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.
Sodom. Plural of Hebrew origin; Sodoma, a place in Palestine.
Fire; the heat of the sun, lightning; fig: strife, trials; the eternal fire. A primary word; 'fire'.
Brimstone, sulfur. Probably neuter of theios; sulphur.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To moisten, rain, send rain. A primary verb; to moisten.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and the base of olethros; to destroy fully, literally or figuratively.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
